FuncDef: The display license resource usage command displays the usage of active resource items in a global trotter license (GTL) file.
Examples: Info: Active License on master board: ***.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the usage of active resource items in a GTL file, run the display license resource usage command.
Resource usage indicates the ratio of used resources to those authorized by the GTL file.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
